languages.text: "Вы не застали те годы мора. Исповедники посещали все палубы и гибли во множестве, новых служителей вербовали в каждом порту, на каждой станции. Лица и имена смешивались, мы опознавали родичей по клану лишь по одеяниям. Никто из тех, кто знал истинное лицо Адальберта, не пережил ту пору. Император уберег меня от изобличения".

"You were not there for those years of pestilence. Confessors attended every deck and died in multitudes. New ministers were recruited in every port, at every station. Their names and faces blurred together, and we recognised our kin only by their robes. No one who knew Adalbert's true face survived that time. The Emperor saved me from being exposed."
languages.original_text: "Вы не застали те годы мора. Исповедники посещали все палубы и гибли во множестве, новых служителей вербовали в каждом порту, на каждой станции. Лица и имена смешивались, мы опознавали родичей по клану лишь по одеяниям. Никто из тех, кто знал истинное лицо Адальберта, не пережил ту пору. Император уберег меня от изобличения".

traits.locale_text: "You did not catch those years of pestilence. Confessors attended every deck and died in multitudes, new ministers were recruited in every port, at every station. The names and faces blended, and we recognised our kin only by their robes. No one who knew Adalbert's true face survived that time. The Emperor saved me from being exposed."

"You did not catch those years of pestilence. Confessors attended every deck and died in multitudes, new ministers were recruited in every port, at every station. The names and faces blended, and we recognised our kin only by their robes. No one who knew Adalbert's true face survived that time. The Emperor saved me from being exposed."

"You were not there for those years of pestilence. Confessors attended every deck and died in multitudes; new ministers were recruited in every port, at every station. Their names and faces blurred together, and we recognised our kin only by their robes. No one who knew Adalbert's true face survived that time. The Emperor saved me from being exposed."

"You were not there for those years of pestilence. Confessors attended every deck and died in multitudes; new ministers were recruited in every port, at every station. Their names and faces blurred together, and we recognised our kin only by their robes. No one who knew Adalbert's true face survived that time. The Emperor saved me from being exposed."

"You were not there for those years of pestilence. Confessors attended every deck and died in multitudes. New ministers were recruited in every port, at every station. Their names and faces blurred together, and we recognised our kin only by their robes. No one who knew Adalbert's true face survived that time. The Emperor saved me from being exposed."

"You were not there for those years of pestilence. Confessors attended every deck and died in multitudes. New ministers were recruited in every port, at every station. Their names and faces blurred together, and we recognised our kin only by their robes. No one who knew Adalbert's true face survived that time. The Emperor saved me from being exposed."

languages.text: "Ihr wart in diesen Jahren der Pestilenz nicht da. Konfessoren haben sich um alle Decks gekümmert und sind in großer Zahl gestorben. Neue Seelsorger wurden in jedem Hafen rekrutiert, in jeder Station. Ihre Namen und Gesichter verschwammen, und wir erkannten die Unseren nur noch an der Robe. Niemand, der Adalberts wahres Gesicht kannte, hat diese Zeit überlebt. Der Imperator hat mich davor bewahrt, durchschaut zu werden."
languages.original_text: "You were not there for those years of pestilence. Confessors attended every deck and died in multitudes. New ministers were recruited in every port, at every station. Their names and faces blurred together, and we recognised our kin only by their robes. No one who knew Adalbert's true face survived that time. The Emperor saved me from being exposed."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr wart in diesen Jahren der Pestilenz nicht da. Konfessoren haben sich um alle Decks gekümmert und sind in großer Zahl gestorben. Neue Seelsorger wurden in jedem Hafen rekrutiert, in jeder Station. Ihre Namen und Gesichter verschwammen, und wir erkannten die Unseren nur noch an der Robe. Niemand, der Adalberts wahres Gesicht kannte, hat diese Zeit überlebt. Der Imperator hat mich davor bewahrt, durchschaut zu werden."

languages.text: «Usted no estuvo aquí durante esos años de pestilencia. Los confesores atendían todas las cubiertas y morían en tropel. Se reclutaban nuevos ministros en cada puerto, en cada estación. Sus nombres y sus rostros se entremezclaban, y solamente podíamos reconocer a los nuestros por sus túnicas. Nadie que conociese el verdadero rostro de Adalbert sobrevivió a aquellos días. El Emperador no quiso que se revelase mi identidad».
languages.original_text: "You were not there for those years of pestilence. Confessors attended every deck and died in multitudes. New ministers were recruited in every port, at every station. Their names and faces blurred together, and we recognised our kin only by their robes. No one who knew Adalbert's true face survived that time. The Emperor saved me from being exposed."

traits.locale_text: «Usted no estuvo aquí durante esos años de pestilencia. Los confesores atendían todas las cubiertas y morían en tropel. Se reclutaban nuevos ministros en cada puerto, en cada estación. Sus nombres y sus rostros se entremezclaban, y solamente podíamos reconocer a los nuestros por sus túnicas. Nadie que conociese el verdadero rostro de Adalbert sobrevivió a aquellos días. El Emperador no quiso que se revelase mi identidad».

languages.text: 「疫病が蔓延した数年間、あなたはそこにいなかった。懺悔者たちがあらゆるデッキに集まって、大勢が命を落としていったんだ。あちこちのベイやステーションで、新しい司祭が採用された。彼らの名前と顔は曖昧になり、身につけるローブだけで親族を認識していた。アダルバートの素顔を知る者は、その時代を生き延びることはできなかったんだ。皇帝が私を救ってくださったのだ」
languages.original_text: "You were not there for those years of pestilence. Confessors attended every deck and died in multitudes. New ministers were recruited in every port, at every station. Their names and faces blurred together, and we recognised our kin only by their robes. No one who knew Adalbert's true face survived that time. The Emperor saved me from being exposed."

traits.locale_text: 「疫病が蔓延した数年間、あなたはそこにいなかった。懺悔者たちがあらゆるデッキに集まって、大勢が命を落としていったんだ。あちこちのベイやステーションで、新しい司祭が採用された。彼らの名前と顔は曖昧になり、身につけるローブだけで親族を認識していた。アダルバートの素顔を知る者は、その時代を生き延びることはできなかったんだ。皇帝が私を救ってくださったのだ」

languages.text: “疫病肆虐的那段日子里，你还没有出现。每层甲板都有很多告解神父，也有无数人因病而死。每个港口、每座星站都在招募新的神父，所有人的名字与面孔都变得模糊起来。我们只能通过长袍来认出我们的族人。在那段日子里，所有见过阿达伯特的人都没能存活下来。是帝皇保佑了我，让我没有暴露身份。”
languages.original_text: "You were not there for those years of pestilence. Confessors attended every deck and died in multitudes. New ministers were recruited in every port, at every station. Their names and faces blurred together, and we recognised our kin only by their robes. No one who knew Adalbert's true face survived that time. The Emperor saved me from being exposed."

traits.locale_text: “疫病肆虐的那段日子里，你还没有出现。每层甲板都有很多告解神父，也有无数人因病而死。每个港口、每座星站都在招募新的神父，所有人的名字与面孔都变得模糊起来。我们只能通过长袍来认出我们的族人。在那段日子里，所有见过阿达伯特的人都没能存活下来。是帝皇保佑了我，让我没有暴露身份。”

languages.text: « Vous n'avez pas connu les longues années où la peste a sévi à notre bord. Sur chaque pont, les confesseurs mouraient par centaines, aussitôt remplacés par de nouveaux ministres recrutés au premier port ou à la première station venus. Leurs noms et leurs visages se succédaient à une vitesse telle que nous ne reconnaissions plus nos semblables qu'à leur robe. Aucun de ceux qui connaissaient le vrai visage d'Adalbert n'a survécu à l'épidémie, mais l'Empereur m'a épargné ce triste sort. »
languages.original_text: "You were not there for those years of pestilence. Confessors attended every deck and died in multitudes. New ministers were recruited in every port, at every station. Their names and faces blurred together, and we recognised our kin only by their robes. No one who knew Adalbert's true face survived that time. The Emperor saved me from being exposed."

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'avez pas connu les longues années où la peste a sévi à notre bord. Sur chaque pont, les confesseurs mouraient par centaines, aussitôt remplacés par de nouveaux ministres recrutés au premier port ou à la première station venus. Leurs noms et leurs visages se succédaient à une vitesse telle que nous ne reconnaissions plus nos semblables qu'à leur robe. Aucun de ceux qui connaissaient le vrai visage d'Adalbert n'a survécu à l'épidémie, mais l'Empereur m'a épargné ce triste sort. »

languages.text: "Sen hastalık yıllarında burada değildin. Günah çıkarıcılar tüm güvertelerde görevlendiriliyor ve toplu hâlde ölüyorlardı. Her limanda, her istasyonda yeni din görevlileri işe alınıyordu. İsimleri ve yüzleri birbirine girmişti ve bizden olanları yalnızca cübbelerinden tanıyorduk. O sıralarda Adalbert'in gerçek yüzünü bilen hiç kimse sağ kalmadı. İmparator beni afişe olmaktan korudu."
languages.original_text: "You were not there for those years of pestilence. Confessors attended every deck and died in multitudes. New ministers were recruited in every port, at every station. Their names and faces blurred together, and we recognised our kin only by their robes. No one who knew Adalbert's true face survived that time. The Emperor saved me from being exposed."
